name: School Trip To Earth
description:
A game where you, an alien substitute teacher, have to pick up your students during an excursion to planet Earth.

The catch: You don't know those kids that well. Equipped with a short description of each kid, you have to piece together which ones are yours and which ones aren't.

-----------

Made as the final assignment for the Introduction To Game Development course at the Brno University of Technology.

Authors:
Daniel Greš
Patrik Fruštok
Pavol Pánisz
